Performer:
Nozawa Matsuya (野澤松也)

Dates: '1974-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Dejitaru bunka raiburarī (Japan Arts Council)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Shamisen Player:

April 1974 National Theatre: The Tycoon's Exploit

July 1974: A Tragic Love Triangle

October 1974: Fishing for Wives

November 1974: The Dumpling Peddlers

February 1975: The Battle of Ichinotani

September 1975: The Vow of Rokusuke

October 1975: The White Fox of Shinoda

January 1976: The Dance of Sambaso

March 1976: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

April 1976: The Story of Priest Roben

May 1976: The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu

May 1976: Kumagai at the Fan Shop

July 1976: The Dances of the Four Seasons

November 1976: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

December 1976: The League of the 47 Ronin

January 1977: The Mask Peddler

February 1977: Kokaji the Swordsmith

April 1977: The Teachings for Women

May 1977: The Teachings for Women

June 1977: The Shank's Mare along the Tokaido Highway

July 1977 Asahiza: The Love of Ohan and Choemon

August 1977 Tour: Sansho Dayu

September 1977: The Love Suicides at Amijima

October 1977: The Courier for Hell

November 1977: The League of the 47 Ronin

January 1978: The Battle of Coxinga

January 1978: Fishing for Wives

February 1978: Gonza the Lancer

April 1978: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1978: The Story of the Morning Glory

June 1978: Nami (The Wave)

June 1978: Omon Toda

January 1975: The Dragon and the Tiger

December 1977 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Vendetta in Iga
